EVALUATE

		)

	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			ROLLUPADDISSUBTOTAL(
				ROLLUPGROUP('DIM_001_DATE'[MonthKor], 'DIM_001_DATE'[Sort_Month]), "IsGrandTotalRowTotal"
			),
			__DS0FilterTable,
			__DS0FilterTable2,
			__DS0FilterTable3,
			__DS0FilterTable4,
			__DS0FilterTable5,
			"판매금액", 'Measure'[판매금액],
			"수정계획금액", 'Measure'[수정계획금액],
			"달성율", 'Measure'[달성율],
			"전년당월판매금액", 'Measure'[전년당월판매금액],
			"판매증감률", 'Measure'[판매증감률]
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryWindowed = 
		TOPN(
			502,
			__DS0Core,
			[IsGrandTotalRowTotal],
			0,
			'DIM_001_DATE'[Sort_Month],
			1,
			'DIM_001_DATE'[MonthKor],
			1
		)

EVALUATE
	__DS0PrimaryWindowed

ORDER BY
	[IsGrandTotalRowTotal] DESC, 'DIM_001_DATE'[Sort_Month], 'DIM_001_DATE'[MonthKor]
